content.title: On Earth
content.content:
2009 - The Epic Realm of Tolkien is published.
2012 - Principal photography of The Hobbit films ends.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
